__e: [British accent] We've hit a few delays, but you'll get your precious cargo by tomorrow.
I'm glad to see that you survived, Maggie, you and your precious cargo.
If Acosta came all this way, there's no way he's riding without his prized cargo.
You're saying that your lives matter to one another.
Life is precious and no one really knows how long we've got.
To me, the most precious and lovely thing in this world is your daughter Anna
You said you couldn't live without me, that you needed me more than bread and water.
After all, she is the most precious thing I have.
Maybe she's more valuable than just a one-day ridealong.
Cordelia, do you have any idea just how precious you are?
Let her be as precious to you... as she's been to me.
If there's one thing losing my babies taught me it's that life is far too precious to continue trying to earn your love and respect.
